details.text: This node adds msg.gate property with the configured command: 'start', 'stop', 'pause', 'replay', or 'resetFilter'.
For 'pause' command, it also adds msg.pause property with the configured pause duration.
Optional delay can be configured to postpone the command transmission.
Connect this node to an Automation Gate node to control its behavior dynamically.
